page.title: 14POPULAR GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: The most popular games played at our school are football and tig. Girls like skipping. Primary 7 girls tend to chat more than play. One of the games we play in our school is Bungey. To play it you need a ball and a wall. The number of players can range from 1 to 8. You line up and take turns by throwing or kicking the ball against the wall. If you miss the wall you are out. Another game is T.V. tig which is like tig but when the person who is 'it' comes up to you, you bend down, touch the ground and say aloud the title of a T.V. programme. If you get caught when you are not down or if you don't say a programme you are 'it'.
